body_html:
@TGithubbr I notice you were using v1.10, which is still built by CMake.

I think this problem no longer exists when building TensorFlow on Windows with Bazel, which will be default from v1.11.

I can also confirm the //tensorflow/python/kernel_tests:softmax_op_test is passing on Windows on TF CI.

Here's my result with a recent tensorflow nightly build:

pcloudy@TENSORLOW-JENKI C:\tools\msys64\home\pcloudy\workspace\tf_gpu_test
# type test.py
import tensorflow as tf
with tf.device('/{}:{}'.format('gpu','0')):
    x = [0., -1., 2., 3.]
    softmax_x = tf.nn.softmax(x)
    session = tf.Session()
    print(session.run(softmax_x))

pcloudy@TENSORLOW-JENKI C:\tools\msys64\home\pcloudy\workspace\tf_gpu_test
# C:\python36\python test.py

body_text:
@TGithubbr I notice you were using v1.10, which is still built by CMake.
I think this problem no longer exists when building TensorFlow on Windows with Bazel, which will be default from v1.11.
I can also confirm the //tensorflow/python/kernel_tests:softmax_op_test is passing on Windows on TF CI.
Here's my result with a recent tensorflow nightly build:
pcloudy@TENSORLOW-JENKI C:\tools\msys64\home\pcloudy\workspace\tf_gpu_test
# type test.py
import tensorflow as tf
with tf.device('/{}:{}'.format('gpu','0')):
    x = [0., -1., 2., 3.]
    softmax_x = tf.nn.softmax(x)
    session = tf.Session()
    print(session.run(softmax_x))

body:
@TGithubbr I notice you were using v1.10, which is still built by CMake.

I think this problem no longer exists when building TensorFlow on Windows with Bazel, which will be default from v1.11.

I can also confirm the `//tensorflow/python/kernel_tests:softmax_op_test` is passing on Windows on TF CI.

Here's my result with a recent tensorflow nightly build:
```
pcloudy@TENSORLOW-JENKI C:\tools\msys64\home\pcloudy\workspace\tf_gpu_test
# type test.py
import tensorflow as tf
with tf.device('/{}:{}'.format('gpu','0')):
    x = [0., -1., 2., 3.]
    softmax_x = tf.nn.softmax(x)
    session = tf.Session()
    print(session.run(softmax_x))

pcloudy@TENSORLOW-JENKI C:\tools\msys64\home\pcloudy\workspace\tf_gpu_test
# C:\python36\python test.py
```
